name: NekoBellow - TRIAL Version
description:
It tells the story of a little cat named Niko who has to save his girlfriend named Hikari. of a fat and evil toad named Toshio. Your mission is to save Hikari from Toshio. and beat him as soon as possible before it's too late!


Special Thanks And Credits to... Plasmariel the VGMusician BrickBlock369 BrownCake Rahim Ali DanyLopez123 Guiliana Z. And others!
